tweets.author_name: cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future
tweets.html:
dammit. dammit dammit dammit.
for once the handsome actor's blandness was put to good use. #REVENGE

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) March 16, 2015

What the hell is this show? #LastManOnEarth

— ♛JustJess ♛ (@PatsPrincessNFL) March 16, 2015

Ian hurts my heart even in the bumper. #Shameless

— melissa miller (@Serrae) March 16, 2015

I've never hated Kevin before. I hate Kevin right now. This is very sad. #Shameless

— Carrie Raisler (@TVandDinners) March 16, 2015

Cameron Monaghan and Noel Fisher just killed me with eye contact alone. #Shameless

— Holly Jolly Christmas (@hollye83) March 16, 2015

I just refrained from tweeting the filthiest joke about Javier and his various fireable offenses. #Shameless

— Melissa Mann (@PhantomRat) March 16, 2015

LIP AND IAN FOREVER. #Shameless

— Holly Jolly Christmas (@hollye83) March 16, 2015

Sorry, can’t tweet about that Lip and Ian scene because I can’t see my computer through my tears. #Shameless

— Melissa Mann (@PhantomRat) March 16, 2015

This is going to make watching Rizzoli and Isles this week very strange. #Shameless

— melissa miller (@Serrae) March 16, 2015

Well that preview for next week had a 2 second clip that will have me flailing for a week. Well done, Showtime marketing team. #Shameless

— Melissa Mann (@PhantomRat) March 16, 2015

"At the end of the day, this isn't about me." Say what, again, Hannah? #GirlsHBO

— Thomas J. West III (@TJWest3) March 16, 2015

Update: still reading all of #Looking through Green Card lens. "Co-habitation WOULD improve your application! Good call!"

— Myles McNutt (@Memles) March 16, 2015

What?!? What's next, Rick? Stop and Frisk? #TheWalkingDead

— Reappropriate (@reappropriate) March 16, 2015

Hey, #TheWalkingDead, best use of a revolving door since GRAND HOTEL. http://t.co/UatYTUeMkG

— Kelli Marshall (@KelliMarshall) March 16, 2015

The Walking Dead broke my heart tonight and gave me my new favorite curse word. Welcome to my daily repertoire, "mother dick"

— Leslie Grossman (@MissLeslieG) March 16, 2015

Dammit, I wish these characters wore name tags. #TheWalkingDead

— Bah, Handlen! (@zhandlen) March 16, 2015

The best part about dying on this show must be knowing that in a few months, they’ll make you talk to Chris Hardwick. #TheWalkingDead

— Bah, Handlen! (@zhandlen) March 16, 2015

Can someone tell The Walking Dead producers that black lives matter?

— The Rude Pundit (@rudepundit) March 16, 2015

#TheWalkingDead: You'll see a guy ripped apart from the inside out, but the worst curse you'll hear is the incomprehensible "mother dick."

Oh! A Good Wife ep about the legal implications of new technology! My favorite kind!

— Stephanie Brown (@stephbrown) March 16, 2015

She lied. St. Alicia LIED. #TheGoodWife

GARY COLE IN THE CREDITS! THIS IS NOT A DRILL! #TheGoodWife

ABERNATHTY! OMG. FINALLY. #TheGoodWife

— Noel Kirkpatrick (@noelrk) March 16, 2015

Why hello there Mathew Goode and welcome back! #TheGoodWife

Gary Cole's mustache should run for President. #TheGoodWife

So NOW we know why Diane got into the law.. testimony makes her horny! #TheGoodWife

Get it, Diane! #TheGoodWife

Who needs elevators when you've got expert gun testimony, eh Diane?! #TheGoodWife

Why hasn't #TheGoodWife been giving us hot car sex scenes with Diane this entire time

I can't decide if I want the cast of The Good Wife to be defense or prosecution in the Robert Durst trial.

"I seem to have some bad boy issues." Girrrrlll... #TheGoodWife

Thought there was a new Darkness at Noon during this Good Wife, but it's just a Bosch ad.

Oooo, Hubby is mad. Diane, you need to treat him like a hostile witness. (See My Cousin Vinny) #TheGoodWife

"Handsome men are so weak". With this, Marissa Gold continues to be the best. #TheGoodWife

DIANE LOCKHART GOT HER SHOES OFF WHAT IS THIS WORLD COMING TO #TheGoodWife

I almost saw more of Diane than is legal on network TV but I'm kinda okay with that. #TheGoodWife She just Sharon Stoned on that couch.

I reiterate from last week:
She knows she can freakin' well have Matthew Goode right?#TheGoodWife

GOOD GRAVY #TheJinx

Oh my God!!! #TheJinxHBO ending!! Unbelievable!!!

OMG This is F----ing surreal. #TheJinx @HBO

Adnan also did it.

And If I misheard that, I DONT WANT TO KNOW

@gilbertcruz You did not mishear.

@Memles @gilbertcruz We all know how Bob Durst prefers to take his sandwiches!

(This is going to make Brick's whispery tic on The Middle seem way more creepy.)

do I have to watch The Jinx now
